1: <pb/><t>A eb' syiq'uel sb'a d'a scal eb' yetanimail, an̈ej tas sgana eb' sayeq'ui, max schalaj yab' junoc razón vach' eb'.</t>
2: <t>A eb' chuc spensar, malaj sgana eb' sc'ayb'ej junoc tas, an̈ej eb' sgana syal yico'.</t>
3: <t>Tato tz'och eb' sc'ulan chucal d'a co cal, tzon̈ ac'ji q'uixvelal yuj eb'. Tato tz'och eb' b'uchumtac d'a co cal, tzon̈ b'uchji yuj eb'.</t>
4: <t>A tas syal eb' anima ay spensar, nivan jelanil syal quic'an yuuj. A tas syal eb' chi', lajan icha junoc a a' jul yich, ma icha sical a a' to sq'ueul sjaj.</t>
5: <t>Tato ayic eb' tz'och smul syic' eb' vin̈ yajal, axo tas syal eb' malaj smul, max schalaj yab' eb' vin̈, yelxo val man̈ vach'oc.</t>
6: <t>A yuj tas syal eb' malaj spensar, sq'ue vaan oval. A yuj tas syal eb' chi' scotcan d'a yib'an̈ eb'.</t>
7: <t>A yuj tas syal eb' chuc spensar, tz'ochcan d'a yib'an̈ eb'. Yuj tas syal eb' chi', munil syaalej sb'a eb'.</t>
8: <t>A tas syal eb' alum pecal, lajan icha juntzan̈ tas vach' sloji, sc'och val schi'al d'a sc'ol eb' tz'ab'an chi'.</t>
9: <t>A eb' jaragana yed' eb' sjuanel junoc tasi, ichato yuc'tac sb'a eb'.</t>
10: <t>A Jehová lajan icha junoc cuartel te vach', a d'ay sc'och eb' tojol spensar scol sb'a.</t>
11: <t>A snaan eb' b'eyum to a sb'eyumal eb' lajan icha junoc muro ayoch d'a junoc chon̈ab' yic scolji yuuj.</t>
12: <t>A ic'ojchan̈b'ail tzon̈ ic'jiemta yuuj, axo emnaquilal, tzon̈ ic'jichaan̈ yuuj.</t>
13: <t>Yelxo te q'uixvelal tato tzon̈ comon tac'vi ayic manto cab' junoc lolonel sic'lab'il.</t>
14: <t>Tato tec'an spixan junoc penaay, stechaj syaelal chi' yuuj. Axo pax junoc man̈ tec'anoc spixan jun, maxtzac techajlaj yuuj.</t>
15: <t>A eb' aj pensar, tz'ilchaj jelanil yuj eb', yujto b'ecan sc'ool eb' sc'ayb'ani.</t>
16: <t>Yuj tas co siej, yaln̈ej mach anima tzon̈ chaani, vach'chom eb' anima nivac yopisio.</t>
17: <t>A eb' b'ab'el syal sb'a, ichato scol sb'a eb' snaani, palta ayic sc'och eb' yajc'ool eb' chi' jun, scheclajeli tas yaj yoval eb' chi'.</t>
18: <t>A suerte tz'alani slajvi junoc oval, yuj chi' spojchaj snan̈al eb' van yac'an oval chi'.</t>
19: <t>Tato sco tzuntzejcot yoval junoc co c'ab' coc, más secojtac co satanel junoc chon̈ab' ay smuroal yed' spuertail vach' yajoch yijchul d'a yichan̈ yic tzon̈ ochxi vach'il yed'oc, yujto tec'an yaj spensar.</t>
20: <t>A yuj tas scala', scot yaelal ma scot tzalajc'olal d'ayon̈.</t>
21: <t>A lolonel syal yic'ancot co chamel, ma co q'uinal, yuj chi' vach' tato sco na tas scala', yic vach' tzon̈ elc'ochi.</t>
22: <t>Ayic tz'och yetb'eyum eb' vin̈ vinac, tz'ilchaj vach'ilal yuj eb' vin̈, yujto scha svach'c'olal Jehová eb' vin̈.</t>
23: <t>A eb' meb'a' stevi eb', axo eb' b'eyum, te ac'umtac syutej sb'a eb' stac'vi.</t>
24: <t>Tato te ay camigo, ay smay tzon̈ ixtaxel yuj eb'. Palta ay pax eb' camigo yelxo te vach' d'a yichan̈ eb' co c'ab' coc.</t>
